at_risks.description: Customer has requested more time to get caught up on outstanding balance.
Customer has been severely ill in the hospital. They will be catching up on their balance.
Customer claims payment has been sent. They provided check number 2396. Need to verify on our side.
Customer has been traveling. Committed to sending payment next week. Follow up with accounting.
Customer just entered divorce proceedings. They need 90 days to get settled on their side.
Customer was in an auto accident. They requested 90 days to get caught up on unpaid balance.

tasks.subject: Call Customer
tasks.note: They have questions about the installation

tasks.note: Thank customer for selecting us and offer to ask any follow up questions

tasks.note: Heater doesn't appear to be kicking on

tasks.note: Customer has questions about a few settings in the panel.

tasks.note: Customer wasn't at home for the appointment. Call to reschedule.

lead_interactions.note: Talked on phone and they said they are going to sign up tomorrow.
Wanted me to call back next week.
